patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,8 +1,9 @@
 FROM node:22-alpine AS build
 WORKDIR /app
 COPY package.json ./
-RUN npm install 
+RUN npm install pnpm -g
+RUN pnpm install
 COPY . .
 RUN npm run build:stage
 
 FROM nginx:1.19.0-alpine AS prod-stage

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -3,9 +3,9 @@
 COPY package.json ./
 RUN npm install pnpm -g
 RUN pnpm install
 COPY . .
-RUN npm run build:stage
+RUN pnpm run build
 
 FROM nginx:1.19.0-alpine AS prod-stage
 COPY --from=build /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
 EXPOSE 80

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
FROM node:22-alpine AS build
WORKDIR /app
COPY package.json ./
RUN npm install 
COPY . .
RUN npm run build:stage

FROM nginx:1.19.0-alpine AS prod-stage
COPY --from=build /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
EXPOSE 80
CMD ["nginx","-g","daemon off;"]
